author: PTI
title: COVID-19 | China announces additional $30 million grant for WHO after Trump halts funding
description: The grant will be in addition to the $20 million provided by China earlier to the WHO
content: China on Thursday announced an additional $30 million grant to the World Health Organisation, days after Beijing expressed serious concern over U.S. President Donald Trumps decision to freeze the funding for the global health agency over its handling of the C… [+1982 chars]
